4079492.name: Atlantic Coast Route - Proposed Iceland part

7542541.name: Strandleið
7542541.note: June 2020 – Signs at the southern end in Kópavogur imply that the route continues further, but the municipality of Garðabær has yet to put up signs for this route.

8195099.name: Fjólublá leið
8195099.note: Nov. 2019 – Unsigned in the municipality of Kópavogur.

8397850.name: Tenging Smáralind
8397850.description: The purple cycle route is unsigned in the municipality of Kópavogur. A better connection past Smáralind is in the works; in the meantime this route serves as a temporary connection.

8476041.name: Tenging Höfnin
8476041.description: A better connection past Harpa is under construction and will become a part of the coastal route once completed. The eastern half of this relation will be removed once that stretch is opened. The western half is still unclear; this route serves as a tempo

9622974.name: Tenging Reykjanesbraut
9622974.description: The red cycle route currently has no well-defined end point, so this is a temporary connection to the highway going out of town.
